casebody.data:
No. 10-274. Gillian B. Loya, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Ricardo D. Loya, Deceased, et al., Petitioners v. Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, Inc., et al. 562 U.S. 1062, 131 S. Ct. 645,

178 L. Ed. 2d 479,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9124. November 29, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 583 F.3d 656.
